list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Replace language engine with `lexicor` and enhance grammar logic
- Replaced the internal `dictionaryx`-based `LanguageAnalyzer` with the more robust `lexicor` package for all natural language processing tasks. - Deleted the old implementation file (`language_analyzer_o.dart`). - Introduced a global, one-time initialization for the NLP engine (`LanguageAnalyzer.initShared()`) to improve performance across linting sessions. - Added more sophisticated stemming logic to `LanguageAnalyzer` for detecting gerunds (`-ing`) and past-tense verbs (`-ed`), including handling of double consonants and silent 'e'. - Refactored and simplified `LanguageAnalyzer` unit tests to use `lexicor`'s mockable API. - Introduced `ArchLogger`, a new tagged logging utility, to aid in debugging complex grammar and file resolution logic. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` by ensuring mock `LanguageAnalyzer` methods return default `false` values in tests, preventing null crashes. - Cleaned up IDE project files by removing obsolete device definitions and updating run configurations.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Dart Test.Tests in grammar_logic_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.Tests in grammar_rule_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.Tests in language_analyzer_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.Tests in naming_antipattern_rule_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.Tests in naming_logic_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.Tests in naming_pattern_rule_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.should allow Adjective modifiers in grammar_logic_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.should fallback to full name if extraction pattern fails in grammar_logic_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.should pass for Adjective in Noun Phrase (ActiveUserModel) in grammar_logic_test.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Test.should report violation when Vocabulary defines \"Parsing\" as verb in grammar_rule_test.dart.executor": "Run", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "RunOnceActivity.readMode.enableVisualFormatting": "true", "cf.first.check.clang-format": "false", "cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "dart.analysis.tool.window.visible": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "io.flutter.project.isFirstOpen": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "E:/Projects/Google/Flutter/packages/architecture_workspace/packages/architecture_lints/lib/src/engines/language", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.sourceCode.Markdown", "show.migrate.to.gradle.popup": "false" } }

configuration.name: should report violation when Vocabulary defines "Parsing" as verb in grammar_rule_test.dart

option.name: testName
option.value: should report violation when Vocabulary defines "Parsing" as verb

item.itemvalue: Dart Test.should report violation when Vocabulary defines "Parsing" as verb in grammar_rule_test.dart

task.summary:
Chore: Clean up and regenerate IDE project files
- Deleted numerous outdated IntelliJ IDEA configuration files (`.idea/*.xml`, `.idea/.gitignore`). - Regenerated project-specific `.iml` files for the root workspace and sub-packages (`architecture_clean`, `architecture_lints`). - Updated the main project name from `clean_architecture_workspace` to `architecture_workspace`. - Cleaned up and updated various IDE settings, including module paths, run configurations, and device lists.

Chore: Clean up and regenerate IDE project files
- Deleted numerous outdated IntelliJ IDEA configuration files (`.idea/*.xml`) and added new project-specific `.iml` files. - Renamed the project from `Clean Architecture Workspace` to `Architecture Workspace` in `README.md`. - Regenerated run configurations and other IDE settings.

Docs: Rework documentation and add configuration presets
- Rewrote the `architecture_lints` `README.md` to be a comprehensive configuration manual for the `architecture.yaml` file, detailing modules, components, policies, and actions. - Overhauled the `architecture_clean` `README.md` to position it as a preset for `architecture_lints`, explaining its provided base classes, lint presets, and code generation templates. - Added a `recommended.yaml` preset to `architecture_clean`, providing a complete, well-documented configuration for a feature-first clean architecture. - Introduced new code generation templates to `architecture_clean` for creating Freezed models (`model_freezed.dart.mustache`), repository implementations (`repository_impl.dart.mustache`), and `toEntity` methods (`model_to_entity_method.dart.mustache`). - Updated the main `README.md` to reflect the new package structure (`architecture_lints` as the engine, `architecture_clean` as the preset). - Refined the example project's `README.md` to better guide users through the demonstration of the linting rules. - Added new IDE configuration files for IntelliJ (`.idea/*.xml`).

Docs: Prepare for initial beta release
- Replaced the detailed version history in `architecture_lints/CHANGELOG.md` with a summary for the initial `0.1.0` beta release. - Updated `pubspec.yaml` in the `architecture_lints` package to include `homepage` and `issue_tracker` URLs. - Updated IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration (`.idea/workspace.xml`).

Refactor: Remove all legacy and experimental tests
- Deleted the entire suite of old and experimental tests from the `packages/architecture_lints/test/` directory to clean up the project and remove obsolete code. - Removed legacy test helpers, mocks, fakes, and data builders, including `analyzer_test_utils.dart`, `test_resolver.dart`, and `architecture_config_mock.dart`. - Commented out the import and usage of `debug_action_context` and `debug_component_identity` lints in `architecture_lints.dart` to disable them from the plugin.

Refactor: Remove all legacy tests and disable debug lints
- Deleted the entire `test/` directory in `packages/architecture_lints`, removing all legacy and experimental test suites, helpers, mocks, and data builders. - Deleted `packages/architecture_lints/bin/custom_lint.dart` as it is no longer required.

Refactor: Enhance `ListWrapper` type safety and clean up project files
- Strengthened the type safety of `ListWrapper` by specifying `dynamic` for its generic type parameter in the `MemberAccessor`. - Deleted the obsolete `custom_lint.dart` entrypoint from `packages/architecture_lints/bin/` as it is no longer needed.

Cleanup and refactor project files
- Standardized import order across multiple files for consistency. - Removed trailing whitespace, redundant blank lines, and unnecessary comments throughout the codebase and example files. - Added `format` and `fix` commands to the root `pubspec.yaml` to streamline code formatting and linting for the workspace. - Refactored `ArchitectureFix.runProtected` to be an `async` method. - Cleaned up various files by removing commented-out code and empty constructors. - Made minor logic and formatting improvements in `MapExtensions`, `TokenSyntax`, and other utility classes.

Cleanup and refactor project files
- Added an explicit `dynamic` type parameter to `Iterable` in `VariableResolver`'s `_buildCollectionMeta` for improved type safety. - Commented out the unused `_calculateFullPath` method in `RelatedFileResolver` to clean up the codebase. - Removed several files from project tracking in the `.idea/workspace.xml` file.

Refactor language engine and add comprehensive naming tests
- Refactored `LanguageAnalyzer` to use a dictionary abstraction (`DictionaryMSA`) instead of a concrete implementation, improving testability. - Implemented extensive unit tests for `LanguageAnalyzer`, covering vocabulary overrides, pluralization, gerunds, and past tense detection. - Added comprehensive integration tests for naming rules (`NamingPatternRule`, `NamingAntipatternRule`, and `GrammarRule`) to validate behavior with live configuration and file resolution. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` to prevent crashes when analyzing complex or unexpected class names by providing default `false` return values in the mock `LanguageAnalyzer`. - Added detailed debug logging to `GrammarLogic` and `VocabularyDefinition` to aid in diagnosing name analysis issues. - Introduced a suite of test helpers, including `fakes` (e.g., `FakeCustomLintContext`), `mocks`, and a `TestResolver` to create a realistic analysis environment for tests. - Updated `architecture.yaml` in the example project to use the correct `vocabularies` key instead of the old `vocabulary` key. - Minor cleanup of IDE files and comments in the example project.

Refactor: Replace language engine with `lexicor` and enhance grammar logic
- Replaced the internal `dictionaryx`-based `LanguageAnalyzer` with the more robust `lexicor` package for all natural language processing tasks. - Deleted the old implementation file (`language_analyzer_o.dart`). - Introduced a global, one-time initialization for the NLP engine (`LanguageAnalyzer.initShared()`) to improve performance across linting sessions. - Added more sophisticated stemming logic to `LanguageAnalyzer` for detecting gerunds (`-ing`) and past-tense verbs (`-ed`), including handling of double consonants and silent 'e'. - Refactored and simplified `LanguageAnalyzer` unit tests to use `lexicor`'s mockable API. - Introduced `ArchLogger`, a new tagged logging utility, to aid in debugging complex grammar and file resolution logic. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` by ensuring mock `LanguageAnalyzer` methods return default `false` values in tests, preventing null crashes. - Cleaned up IDE project files by removing obsolete device definitions and updating run configurations.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor and consolidate linting packages
- Merged the functionality of `clean_architecture_kit` and `clean_architecture_lints_experimental` into a single, unified `architecture_lints` package. - Renamed `clean_architecture_core` to `architecture_clean` to align with the new package naming scheme. - Deleted all source, test, and configuration files from the now-obsolete `clean_architecture_kit` and `clean_architecture_lints_experimental` packages. - Renamed `ComponentResolver` to `ComponentRefiner` for semantic clarity, distinguishing it from variable and type resolvers. - Introduced `ActionExecutor` to orchestrate code generation and file modification logic for architectural fixes. - Added `TargetResolver` to dynamically determine the correct file path for generated code based on the configured architecture. - Implemented `EditApplicator` to centralize the logic for applying file changes, supporting injection, replacement, and file creation strategies. - Refactored `ArchitectureFix` into a `ArchitectureFixBase` to streamline the setup and execution of quick fixes. - Modularized the type safety lint logic (`TypeSafetyBaseRule`) to delegate checks to `TypeResolver` for better separation of concerns. - Simplified `CodeGenerator` by removing redundant methods and improving debug output formatting. - Updated the `clean_feature_first` example to use the new `architecture_clean` package and reflect other refactoring changes.

Chore: Clean up and regenerate IDE project files
- Deleted numerous outdated IntelliJ IDEA configuration files (`.idea/*.xml`, `.idea/.gitignore`). - Regenerated project-specific `.iml` files for the root workspace and sub-packages (`architecture_clean`, `architecture_lints`). - Updated the main project name from `clean_architecture_workspace` to `architecture_workspace`. - Cleaned up and updated various IDE settings, including module paths, run configurations, and device lists.

Chore: Clean up and regenerate IDE project files
- Deleted numerous outdated IntelliJ IDEA configuration files (`.idea/*.xml`) and added new project-specific `.iml` files. - Renamed the project from `Clean Architecture Workspace` to `Architecture Workspace` in `README.md`. - Regenerated run configurations and other IDE settings.

Docs: Rework documentation and add configuration presets
- Rewrote the `architecture_lints` `README.md` to be a comprehensive configuration manual for the `architecture.yaml` file, detailing modules, components, policies, and actions. - Overhauled the `architecture_clean` `README.md` to position it as a preset for `architecture_lints`, explaining its provided base classes, lint presets, and code generation templates. - Added a `recommended.yaml` preset to `architecture_clean`, providing a complete, well-documented configuration for a feature-first clean architecture. - Introduced new code generation templates to `architecture_clean` for creating Freezed models (`model_freezed.dart.mustache`), repository implementations (`repository_impl.dart.mustache`), and `toEntity` methods (`model_to_entity_method.dart.mustache`). - Updated the main `README.md` to reflect the new package structure (`architecture_lints` as the engine, `architecture_clean` as the preset). - Refined the example project's `README.md` to better guide users through the demonstration of the linting rules. - Added new IDE configuration files for IntelliJ (`.idea/*.xml`).

Docs: Prepare for initial beta release
- Replaced the detailed version history in `architecture_lints/CHANGELOG.md` with a summary for the initial `0.1.0` beta release. - Updated `pubspec.yaml` in the `architecture_lints` package to include `homepage` and `issue_tracker` URLs. - Updated IntelliJ IDEA workspace configuration (`.idea/workspace.xml`).

Refactor: Remove all legacy and experimental tests
- Deleted the entire suite of old and experimental tests from the `packages/architecture_lints/test/` directory to clean up the project and remove obsolete code. - Removed legacy test helpers, mocks, fakes, and data builders, including `analyzer_test_utils.dart`, `test_resolver.dart`, and `architecture_config_mock.dart`. - Commented out the import and usage of `debug_action_context` and `debug_component_identity` lints in `architecture_lints.dart` to disable them from the plugin.

Refactor: Remove all legacy tests and disable debug lints
- Deleted the entire `test/` directory in `packages/architecture_lints`, removing all legacy and experimental test suites, helpers, mocks, and data builders. - Deleted `packages/architecture_lints/bin/custom_lint.dart` as it is no longer required.

Refactor: Enhance `ListWrapper` type safety and clean up project files
- Strengthened the type safety of `ListWrapper` by specifying `dynamic` for its generic type parameter in the `MemberAccessor`. - Deleted the obsolete `custom_lint.dart` entrypoint from `packages/architecture_lints/bin/` as it is no longer needed.

Cleanup and refactor project files
- Standardized import order across multiple files for consistency. - Removed trailing whitespace, redundant blank lines, and unnecessary comments throughout the codebase and example files. - Added `format` and `fix` commands to the root `pubspec.yaml` to streamline code formatting and linting for the workspace. - Refactored `ArchitectureFix.runProtected` to be an `async` method. - Cleaned up various files by removing commented-out code and empty constructors. - Made minor logic and formatting improvements in `MapExtensions`, `TokenSyntax`, and other utility classes.

Cleanup and refactor project files
- Added an explicit `dynamic` type parameter to `Iterable` in `VariableResolver`'s `_buildCollectionMeta` for improved type safety. - Commented out the unused `_calculateFullPath` method in `RelatedFileResolver` to clean up the codebase. - Removed several files from project tracking in the `.idea/workspace.xml` file.

Refactor language engine and add comprehensive naming tests
- Refactored `LanguageAnalyzer` to use a dictionary abstraction (`DictionaryMSA`) instead of a concrete implementation, improving testability. - Implemented extensive unit tests for `LanguageAnalyzer`, covering vocabulary overrides, pluralization, gerunds, and past tense detection. - Added comprehensive integration tests for naming rules (`NamingPatternRule`, `NamingAntipatternRule`, and `GrammarRule`) to validate behavior with live configuration and file resolution. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` to prevent crashes when analyzing complex or unexpected class names by providing default `false` return values in the mock `LanguageAnalyzer`. - Added detailed debug logging to `GrammarLogic` and `VocabularyDefinition` to aid in diagnosing name analysis issues. - Introduced a suite of test helpers, including `fakes` (e.g., `FakeCustomLintContext`), `mocks`, and a `TestResolver` to create a realistic analysis environment for tests. - Updated `architecture.yaml` in the example project to use the correct `vocabularies` key instead of the old `vocabulary` key. - Minor cleanup of IDE files and comments in the example project.

Refactor: Replace language engine with `lexicor` and enhance grammar logic
- Replaced the internal `dictionaryx`-based `LanguageAnalyzer` with the more robust `lexicor` package for all natural language processing tasks. - Deleted the old implementation file (`language_analyzer_o.dart`). - Introduced a global, one-time initialization for the NLP engine (`LanguageAnalyzer.initShared()`) to improve performance across linting sessions. - Added more sophisticated stemming logic to `LanguageAnalyzer` for detecting gerunds (`-ing`) and past-tense verbs (`-ed`), including handling of double consonants and silent 'e'. - Refactored and simplified `LanguageAnalyzer` unit tests to use `lexicor`'s mockable API. - Introduced `ArchLogger`, a new tagged logging utility, to aid in debugging complex grammar and file resolution logic. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` by ensuring mock `LanguageAnalyzer` methods return default `false` values in tests, preventing null crashes. - Cleaned up IDE project files by removing obsolete device definitions and updating run configurations.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Refactor: Replace language engine with `lexicor` and enhance grammar logic
- Replaced the internal `dictionaryx`-based `LanguageAnalyzer` with the more robust `lexicor` package for all natural language processing tasks. - Deleted the old implementation file (`language_analyzer_o.dart`). - Introduced a global, one-time initialization for the NLP engine (`LanguageAnalyzer.initShared()`) to improve performance across linting sessions. - Added more sophisticated stemming logic to `LanguageAnalyzer` for detecting gerunds (`-ing`) and past-tense verbs (`-ed`), including handling of double consonants and silent 'e'. - Refactored and simplified `LanguageAnalyzer` unit tests to use `lexicor`'s mockable API. - Introduced `ArchLogger`, a new tagged logging utility, to aid in debugging complex grammar and file resolution logic. - Hardened `GrammarLogic` by ensuring mock `LanguageAnalyzer` methods return default `false` values in tests, preventing null crashes. - Cleaned up IDE project files by removing obsolete device definitions and updating run configurations.
